alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 2:43PM CDT until July 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of the Panhandle of Oklahoma, including the following county, Beaver. Portions of the Panhandle of Texas, including the following counties, Lipscomb and Ochiltree. * WHEN...Until 500 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 241 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Roadways in Lipscomb County reported roads closed due to the ongoing flooding in northern areas of the county. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Perryton, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Balko, Mocane, Floris, Slapout, Bryans Corner, Boyd and Turpin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
